archimate:BusinessService.name: 1/ ENTREPRISE SERVICE
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
An ENTREPRISE SERVICE(1) is defined by its qualities i.e :repeatable , reliable and valuable. and by a supported ENTREPRISE PROCESS(3).
THIS is used to identify a capabilities at entreprise level, to be used internally or externally to predefined consumer , usually involved in the context of and ENTERPRISE PROCESS(2).
